interestingFact: China is the world's most populous country and the third-largest by total area.
India is the world's largest democracy and has more than 1,600 languages spoken across the country.
The U.S. has the largest economy in the world, making up about a quarter of the global GDP.
Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world, with over 17,000 islands.
Pakistan is home to the world's second-highest mountain, K2, in the Karakoram Range.
Brazil is the largest country in South America and has the world's largest rainforest, the Amazon.
Nigeria is the most populous country in Africa and has one of the largest economies on the continent.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area, covering more than 11% of Earth's landmass.
